overview: Nikita and her husband Ludo have an idea in mind for their evening. On a dating site, they spotted the profile of JPX75, "well-mannered, well-mounted" alias Josh. Nikita opens the door for him. At first seductive, our guest starts to lose his means when Nikita offers him a glass of champagne... and her husband joins them. "Is it my husband's presence that bothers you?" she asks him. "Didn't you register on the site that you wanted to "get a chick"? Well here it is, it's me" she continues, provocatively. The evening continues in the living room where Nikita offers herself an intense double penetration with the two men.
title: Obsessions 2
